title: Nyctanthes arbor-tristis
Vernacular name:
English- coral jasmine
Hindi- harsingar
gujarati - Parijat
Sanskrit- Gandharvahasta
Chemical Constituents: Oil Î±-pinene, p-cymene, 1- hexanol methyl heptanone, phenyl acetaldehyde, 1-deconol and anisaldehyde
Therapeutic uses: anti-helminthic and anti-pyretic besides its use as a laxative, in rheumatism, skin ailments and as a sedative.
